footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Charlotte | Update Date: 11/17/2023 | Editor: talpha

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Skyward Atlas and Memory of Dust__
ATK% stat sticks with useless passives. Still, one of her great options.
__Oathsworn Eye__
Her best (4 star) option. Works especially well with her, an ATK% scaling healer who needs significant amounts of ER%. (Depending on Energy requirements, it can be worse or better then 5 star statstick counterparts.)

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Favonius Codex__
Great general option that can reduce both her and teammates ER requirements by a large margin, especially with high refinements. Keep in mind that Charlotte needs a considerable amount of crit rate for this (approximately 50% for R5 Favonius Codex)

Alternatively any ATK% or Energy Recharge substat weapon can work.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge|<goblet> ATK%|<circlet> Healing Bonus

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Still Photo: Comprehensive Confirmation
**2)** Elemental Skill: Framing: Freezing Point Composition
**3)** Normal Attack: Cool-Color Capture
**->** *Normal Attack can be left unleveled*

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Energy Recharge requirements: (will be updated)

As a last option, you can go 2x ATK%, 2x ATK% artifact sets but generally its not recommended.
